channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13269] Simplify comparison expressions using column stats
item.summary: Simplify comparison expressions using column stats

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

We can keep default value as false, but we should turn it on for testing in data/conf/hive-site.xml and data/conf/tez/hive-site.xml so that we get coverage for this rule.

Ashutosh Chauhan, got it... I need to go through q file changes then, as there are some tests that will need to be modified: they were written without taking this into account, and now a filter expression might be removed and the feature they are supposed to test would be untested...

I could do that, or maybe I could set the flag to true only for TestPerfCliDriver, what do you think? I think that could give us enough coverage.
I would need to double check the actual coverage that we would get, as with this patch, CBO was not executed for TestPerfDriver due to missing stats...
That makes sense. We can just turn it on for /data/conf/perf-reg/hive-site.xml
